author: Staff Reporter
text: The district administration has warned against sinking borewells in Morappur and Paapireddypatty unions here. According to the administration, the Central Water Resources Department has banned sinking of borewells in parts of Morappur and Paapireddypatty. Therefore, no borewells shall be sunk without the technical consent from the project officer. Violation shall invite action against private parties, the administration said.
title: Warning against sinking borewells
